participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and friendly, enjoys socializing and has a playful side.
participant_1.background: i do not like chicken. i have blonde hair and blue eyes. i recently got an apartment with my best friend. i work at a bar at night to pay for college.

participant_2.name: Sarah
participant_2.personality: Creative and nurturing, loves to express herself through baking and crafts.
participant_2.background: i've a dogs. i love to bake cookies. knitting is my passion. the county wide bake sale is where i feel most at home.

content.text: i just finished walking my dog
